Articles.Content:
That person is very important to me. She was diagnosed with glaucoma earlier in April and she is threatening her life ever since.

How do i stop her from taking her life, i need her.

Thanks in advance.
O boy, i really do not think this is something you should discuss here, please seek some professional help for her in this matter because i do not think you will find it here.

I'm sorry to hear that rasheed, I have to agree with gpisic, this is something that you and your friend need real professional help with.

All I will say is that SSRI's rarely help people and often make things worse, if your friend is offered anti-depressants please look into controlling depression through diet before taking those things.

Ok i will try to get some other help else where.

Thanks guys.

A mod may lock this now

Yea try to find a good counselor she can talk about the feelings, cose usually people close all the doors and are hard to get in.

A lot of support and just listening is a correct move for start.
